definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: broad, roomy, place;—abs. ´[[מ]]:, of pasture Ho 4:16 (in sim.); fig. of freedom from distress and anxiety 2Sa 22:20 = Ps 18:20, Ps 31:9, Ps 118:5 (MT cstr. in [[מֶרְחַבְיׇה]] spacious place of Yah, i.e. extraordinarily spacious, < [[מֶרְחָב יׇהּ]], [[יׇהּ]] being subj. of vb.); pl. cstr. [[מֶרְחֲבֵי־אֶרֶץ]] Hb Hab 1:6 expanses of the earth.
